title: Raani Jhumkaalu: Heritage Pink Tourmaline & Polki Diamond Bell Earrings
materials: South Sea Pearls and Emerald beads.
features: Exquisite handcrafted Jhumka earrings featuring intricate Polki diamond setting in a classic bell shape. The earrings showcase a prominent pear shaped pink tourmaline top, followed by a round polki and then the Jhumka component. The Jhumka features stunning emerald and pearl dangles, adding a touch of elegance. The metal work displays the traditional 'adda' setting, where the polkis are mounted closely together to maximize sparkle.
occasions: especially for a traditional Telugu bride. Perfect for Seemantham
description: These Raani Jhumkaalu seamlessly blend traditional craftsmanship with modern elegance. The use of high-quality Polki diamonds, South Sea pearls, and vibrant pink tourmaline and emerald creates a timeless and luxurious piece. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's luster, making it a treasured heirloom for generations. Each Jhumka is meticulously handcrafted, ensuring exceptional quality and unique design.
